description: Citizen broadcasters and resistance groups organize emergency assemblies across Stenograd, demanding open testimony on BCI abuses and Council actions.

Rada, inspired by late-night conversations at the bar, leaks Halden’s logs and documentary evidence, urging all parties—returnees, Council, citizens—to testify at newly formed public truth commissions.
City squares become truth commission forums; crowds gather as testimonies air live, setting the stage for the dismantlement of the BCI.
